participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and patient with a love for nature.
participant_1.background: i'm a woman. i work as a school teacher. i attend church every week. i enjoy gardening and walking outdoors. i have a dogs.

participant_2.name: Geraldine Smith
participant_2.personality: Vivacious and wise, with a zest for life.
participant_2.background: i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight. i'm 100 years old. i remember when nobody had a television. i am very strong for my age.
